task.title: Install on macOS
task.shortdesc: The installation links are provided on the website.

taskbody.context: Follow these simple steps to install OBS Studio on macOS.

step.cmd: Click the link to install OBS Studio on macOS. https://obsproject.com/kb/mac-installation

step.stepresult: The agent is redirected on another screen for choosing macOS installer.

step.cmd: Click Download Installer (x86_64/Intel) or Download Installer (arm64/Apple Silicon).

stepresult.p: The download gets started. Once the download is complete, an on-screen message is displayed: Thank you for Downloading OBS Studio!
